channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Act Now — Google Issues New Emergency Update For 3 Billion Chrome Users
item.description: Google has issued an emergency update warning for 3.5 billion Chrome browser users across Windows, macOS, Linux and Android platforms. What to know an...

item.title: A Surprising Update About ‘Nobody Wants This’ Season 3 On Netflix
item.description: Will there be a Nobody Wants This season 3? There's some surprising news that's just been made as season 2 hits Netflix.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Saturday, October 25 Clues And Answers (#867)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: ‘Ghost Of Yotei’ Outsold PS5 ‘Assassin’s Creed Shadows’ In Three Weeks, Says Report
item.description: Going head-to-head, Ghost of Yotei is about to blow past Assassin's Creed Shadows with sales on PS5 in just a few weeks since launch.

item.title: Now Is The Time To Buy A Bargain Refurbished PC
item.description: The end of support for Windows 10 will flood the market with cheap, but still very usable, PCs and laptops. Here's how to find a bargain.

item.title: On making it worse

item.title: The future

item.title: Outcomes and tasks

item.title: The writer’s room

item.title: Foggy mirror
